title: Restore site header and footer on all public pages

requirements.summary: Restore the SiteHeader component so it renders correctly on all public-facing pages (homepage, account page), including the sticky top navigation with logo, Account menu entry, and the click-to-call phone button using the configured phone number (9834587806).
acceptanceCriteria: The SiteHeader component is visible at the top of the homepage (/) on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.
The SiteHeader component is visible at the top of the account page (/account) on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.
The header contains the Ceiling Pro logo/brand link, an Account button, and the click-to-call phone button.
The Admin entry is NOT visible in the header for public users.
The header is sticky (remains at top on scroll).

file_operations.description: Import and render the SiteHeader component at the top of the HomePage before all marketing sections. Ensure the header is positioned outside any container that might hide or crop it. The header should be the first child element in the page structure.

Import and render the SiteHeader component at the top of the AccountPage before the account content sections. Ensure proper layout hierarchy so the header appears above all page content including the profile setup modal and booking history.

Review and ensure the SiteHeader component includes: (1) sticky positioning CSS (position: sticky or fixed with top-0), (2) the Ceiling Pro logo/brand link, (3) an Account navigation button that links to /account, (4) a click-to-call phone button using CEILING_PRO_CONFIG.phone (9834587806), and (5) no Admin link visible to public users. Verify the component is fully functional and has no missing imports or broken references.

requirements.summary: Restore the SiteFooter component so it renders correctly at the bottom of all public-facing pages (homepage, account page), displaying company info, phone number (9834587806), email (ceilingpro9@gmail.com), services list, and copyright.
acceptanceCriteria: The SiteFooter component is visible at the bottom of the homepage (/) on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.
The SiteFooter component is visible at the bottom of the account page (/account) on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.
The footer displays the phone number 9834587806, email ceilingpro9@gmail.com, and a services list.
No GST label or placeholder is displayed in the footer.
The footer renders without layout breakage on mobile viewports.

file_operations.description: Import and render the SiteFooter component at the bottom of the HomePage after all marketing and booking sections. Ensure the footer is the last element in the page structure so it appears below all content.

Import and render the SiteFooter component at the bottom of the AccountPage after all account content sections including booking history. Ensure proper layout hierarchy so the footer appears at the page bottom.

Review and ensure the SiteFooter component displays: (1) company information, (2) phone number from CEILING_PRO_CONFIG.phone (9834587806), (3) email from CEILING_PRO_CONFIG.email (ceilingpro9@gmail.com), (4) a services list, (5) copyright with dynamic year, and (6) caffeine.ai attribution. Verify no GST label or placeholder is present. Ensure responsive layout works correctly on mobile viewports without breaking or overflowing.
